## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                         | Type                 | Default  |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------------- | -------- |
| `activeStep` | `active-step` | Current active step index (0-based) | `number`             | `0`      |
| `color`      | `color`       | Color theme                         | `"blue" \| "greeen"` | `'blue'` |
| `steps`      | `steps`       | Array of steps to display           | `Step[]`             | `[]`     |
